prompts: Create a playful Water/Grass-type Pokemon that loves to dance in the rain.
Imagine a Pokemon with a vibrant green body and a happy, singing face.
Design a quirky Pokemon that thrives in wetlands and enjoys social gatherings.
Generate a character inspired by a lily pad, with bright colors and a cheerful demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that can swim gracefully and has a unique leaf-like appearance.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a fun-loving dancer in nature.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a blend of a frog and a flower, full of energy.

distinctive_features: Wide mouth with a cheerful expression
Wavy, zigzag pattern on the body
